mapper.select: select id, merchant_id, merchant_name, agent_id, user_id, product_id, channel_id, provider_id, platform_id, supported_cards, acquiring_mode, supported_consumer, supported_merchant, industries, processing_currencies, settlement_currencies, transaction_type, consumer_currencies, payment_method, limit_amount, limit_currencies, payment_exchange_rate, fixed_fee, transaction_rate, refund_fee, chargebank_fee, settlement_fee, exchange_rate, margin_rate, provider, active, is_deleted, support_recurring, support_one_click, refund_type, refund_expiry_time, support_chargeback, session_timeout, currency, management_fee, payment_type, children_payment_type, payment_identification, exchange_source_currencies, exchange_target_currencies, exchange_rate_difference, operator, creator, request_fee_flag, created_at, updated_at, fee_type, vat, gateway_fee from tb_product_channel where id = #{id}
